mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.category, p.title, u.nickname AS writer_nickname, p.created_at, p.view_count AS view_count, IFNULL(c.cnt, 0) AS comment_count FROM Post p JOIN User u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Comment GROUP BY post_id ) c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE p.category = #{category} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.post_id, p.category, p.title, p.content, p.image_url, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.view_count AS view_count, u.nickname AS writer_nickname, IFNULL(c.cnt, 0) AS comment_count FROM Post p JOIN User u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Comment GROUP BY post_id ) c ON p.post_id = c.post_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
